        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 </div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="89854" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="89854" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.56</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="290">290</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="25"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Aqua Allegoria Florabloom</b> by <b>Guerlain</b> is a Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Aqua Allegoria Florabloom</b> was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Mango, Bergamot and Lime; middle notes are Tuberose, Violet, Rose and Iris; base notes are Coconut, Musk and Sandalwood. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="89854"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.179.jpg" style="width: 4.025rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mango-179.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Mango</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.75364609430049; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 2.575rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.78.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lime-78.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lime</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.25.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tuberose-25.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tuberose</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.90318300578584; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.116.jpg" style="width: 3.325rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Violet-116.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Violet</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.87312766036198; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.105.jpg" style="width: 3.15rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rose-105.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Rose</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.87312766036198; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.11.jpg" style="width: 3.15rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Iris-11.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Iris</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.138.jpg" style="width: 4.2rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Coconut-138.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Coconut</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.96024951017993; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 3.7rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.80477139066561; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 2.8rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="89854"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='2e08938c80921f62f7c582041e82165e178' slotpayload='{"ct":"hmJMkoZsRhDL5ZOc17IJC0tXcFxBj3JQQRyz5Ujst53DmygRDgCVEW4T2ZsRzQCQq722UOr2a5vfjzD2YWeZGk\/gq5YdNe3AFohrrUk5+5kgroCvkm64+1kh49TdPhdPa6vhbNXya6epsSBxplLfyKg9N1vfaRhTxCxDMHT+pgEsClYv9Yj\/5SRpcUYu1ekm2dfvSYLpPTeGgMCnYP0+6QLK1\/wy0+eJxMsBJayESTzck\/0caibVQ2Is5iQvt+MhsAxukAIOMrwZsAzjDSFfDoWO3G2HDvzpjf0fjl2pRxP1WlRHtA10z6LnNUqm\/IBeGuqwNdyw9CMyB+fhYz6FtQ==","iv":"51ed174e5f3a8c17f2e764dfe931749a","s":"2dcc2fdebdf101bd"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2353072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353072" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="franciscrawford"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/242539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.242539.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="franciscrawford" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Insolence-Eau-de-Toilette-67310.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67310.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Insolence Eau de Toilette"title="Insolence Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/242539">franciscrawford</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1731952277" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is the best part as the creamy, sweet, lovely florals rise up to meet you.<br />
<br />
However, it's over quickly and what is left is an odd salty and synthetic base. It reminds me of the off putting salt in Vanilla Vibes but not as pungent. It's not terrible but it is odd, almost plasticky, somewhat sunscreen like, and I believe it may be whatever is used to create the coconut.<br />
<br />
I recently smelled Paradoxe and Donna Born in Roma, two cloying, generic, highly synthetic smelling fragrances. On the heels of those, Florabloom was a relief.<br />
<br />
Love the opening of Florabloom, dislike the rest, but absolutely a tier above in quality compared to the hyped Prada and Valentino. I could wear Florabloom and at least, for the most part, like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2353072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2353072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304654" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rehab_fanman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2275929"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rehab_fanman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81642.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Elixir"title="Le Male Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304654ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304654" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); Usually i dont like womens fragrances. But this one slaps hard. Definitely gonna buy it for my girlfriend. İdk how this thing got 3.50/5. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184210">AleMHS</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 11:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested this today. My SA was so excited to show me this and I am so… Underwhelmed. This was an extremely bland milage of flowers that just didn’t smell good to me. Very much a toilet freshener in a slightly upscale public bathroom. It was an immediate no to such an extent that I didn’t even spend time with it to pick apart the notes like I do with some of the things I’m on the fence with.<br />
<br />
I don’t know what else to say, I’m rather disappointed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2223477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2223477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2201915" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2201915" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adriennb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1928079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="adriennb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Yara-76880.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76880.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yara"title="Yara"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2201915ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2201915" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928079">adriennb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-28">06/28/24 06:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this one and the forte version also smells kind of perfume-y, but not in a bad way actually. They are such nice, feminine scents. I tried the forte one first and I loved it, but then I got a sample of this one and I might love this even more. This is maybe a bit fresher, cleaner, less artificial. Longevity is also pretty good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2201915"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2201915#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198528" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AndyMomTom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1807665"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AndyMomTom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1807665">AndyMomTom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 18:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a good perfume, but I feel like it's kind of a mess of floral and creamy smells put together, which, to me, is a slight bit too cloying to my nose. Guerlain perfumes are high quality, but I would say this perfume isn't as good as their other fresh lign-ups.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2198528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2198528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198062" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198062" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aspirina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/128870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.128870.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aspirina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Eaudemoiselle-de-Givenchy-Ambre-Velours-18920.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18920.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eaudemoiselle de Givenchy Ambre Velours"title="Eaudemoiselle de Givenchy Ambre Velours"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198062ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198062" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/128870">aspirina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 09:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful, natural smelling fruity tuberose. Vacation in a bottle, flirty, sparkly and super feminine. I get mango, coconut, banana and a mix of flowers with a dominant tuberose note.<br />
It follows the trend of bubble gummy tuberose like My way and Paradox but without the nasty ambroxan and other synthetic notes that ruin those scents for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2198062"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2198062#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194542" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194542" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="persimmonism"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1545348.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="persimmonism" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-Profumo-Di-Fiori-62281.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62281.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Bloom Profumo Di Fiori"title="Gucci Bloom Profumo Di Fiori"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194542ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194542" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545348">persimmonism</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 15:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Aqua Allegorias aren't sophisticated, but they're always beautifully realistic (as such I like to enjoy them as scents rather than perfumes). This one smells exactly like those elegant chinese-taiwanese summer desserts: fresh mangos with coconut milk, pearls, jelly. So that gives me joy.<br />
 <br />
Despite the mango-coconut pairing, the scent doesn't turn into some dessert-ish fruity gourmand since much of the creaminess comes from that beautiful bouquet of powdery flowers. I appear to lack the finesse to discern each individual flower, even the rose, which is rare for me, so that part intrigues me, my nose isn't too bored.<br />
And there's also a sort of refreshing, watery, watermelon scent impression I can't shake. If this were a musical piece, it would end on fresh, upswinging notes.<br />
<br />
Just like all her other sisters, Florabloom has two faces, no more, no less. And yes, her opening is beautiful, but... her maturation cloying. On second thought, maybe she's not so realistic as I thought, since I could never get sick of *real* summer mango treats...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2194542"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2194542#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nice and fresh ❤️</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2193115"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2193115#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179709" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2163080" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Smeraldina77"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1613700"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Smeraldina77" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Note-Vanillee-4334.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4334.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Note Vanillée"title="Note Vanillée"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2163080ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2163080" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1613700">Smeraldina77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-21">05/21/24 08:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is quite nice. To me, it is similar to Coconut Fizz (which I have). It is basically a bit more floral (tuberose) version of Coconut Fizz. I do not smell the mango, which is a pity since I was hoping for it. If you have Coconut Fizz, I think you don't need this, and if you are amongst those who mourn the discontinued Coconut Fizz, you can definitely find a nice replacement in Florabloom.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2163080"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2163080#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153863" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2153863" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lilah_lilah2023"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1767593"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1767593.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lilah_lilah2023" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Duelle-Eau-de-Toilette-9241.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9241.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"title="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2153863ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2153863" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1767593">Lilah_lilah2023</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-12">05/12/24 14:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Looking at the notes, this is something I was supposed to like but somehow I don't. It's different from the others in this line, for sure, but somehow I think they put too much stuff in it and it didn't mix well. I can't tell what it is, though... all I know is that it's not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2153863"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2153863#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130831" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130831" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Iowagrown93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Iowagrown93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-Forte-89855.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89855.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Florabloom Forte"title="Aqua Allegoria Florabloom Forte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130831ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130831" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587061">Iowagrown93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 14:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Anyone else smell twilight woods in this?!?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2130831"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2130831#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joexulaje"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747542"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1747542.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="joexulaje" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-Born-In-Roma-Intense-78739.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78739.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna Born In Roma Intense"title="Valentino Donna Born In Roma Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747542">joexulaje</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(Here are some scents I love so you can tell if we share similar tastes which I feel affect a review so much; Valentino Donna Born in Roma Intense, Aquatic Vanilla Dossier, Floral Marshmallow Dossier, CH Good Girl Blush, Fame Women Paco Rabanne, Burberry Her Intense, Alien Goddess Mugler, Soleil Blanc TF, Lost Cherry TF, Mod Vanilla Ariana Grande, CK One/Be)<br />
<br />
This is a FANTASTIC scent. I love violet so much, especially when it is so well done such as in this fragrance. It's powdery, however not overly so, and has a sweet facet due to the tuberose I can't get enough of.<br />
<br />
If I had to choose, the opening is my least favorite because of the lime, but the drydown is just so so lovely! To me this also smells sorta nutty, like a walnut. The sandalwood is to me what makes this scent so much more sophisticated than say Paco Rabanne's Fame (women's). The mango is 100% there in the beginning, however it takes a back seat the more this perfume dries down. The coconut is also there, and it's the kind I love which is more nutty as opposed to green. <br />
<br />
I have a sample of the Forte version, however got this as a gift and I have to admit I think I like this one a bit more. The forte version is slightly more mango forward, and definitely less nutty, but it is also creamier.  <br />
<br />
A love at first sniff, perfect for summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2125642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2125642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107305" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is CURIOUS BY BRITNEY SPEARS I'm not taking a piss and I'm not trying to offend. Guerlain of course is nicer quality, but if you can't pay £120 for this edt then get yourself CURIOUS for £15 it WILL scratch the itch. Powdery fruity tuberose!! Beautiful, light, feminine, not overly sweet, this is how my spring will smell like</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2063257"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2063257#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2048804" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2048804" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr. Beaux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/806857"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr. Beaux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2048804ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2048804" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/806857">Mr. Beaux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-01">02/01/24 07:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've just tried it. In Sephora Spain is already available.<br />
A fruity-floral mess. A tuberose in the vein of Twilly, soft, creamy, sweet, with a big mango push in te opening and coconutty basenotes. It lacks the Twilly sophistication. Vulgar. Guerlain has to change their artistic vision.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2048804"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2048804#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2047541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2047541" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vargadorkaluca"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780467"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1780467.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vargadorkaluca" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Memoire-d-une-Odeur-56096.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56096.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mémoire d’une Odeur"title="Mémoire d’une Odeur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2047541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2047541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780467">vargadorkaluca</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-31">01/31/24 04:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sephora Spain is doing a prelaunch on this perfume.<br />
I tried it and I wasn't impressed to be honest.<br />
It is true to the name for sure, smells like a big bouquet of flowers. Natural smelling tuberose, powdery purple flowers and little bit of rose.<br />
I can see ladies who like Miss Dior or J'adore kind of feminine scent profiles will like this too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2047541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2047541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2047439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; </div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2125642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joexulaje"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747542"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1747542.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="joexulaje" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-Born-In-Roma-Intense-78739.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78739.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna Born In Roma Intense"title="Valentino Donna Born In Roma Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747542">joexulaje</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(Here are some scents I love so you can tell if we share similar tastes which I feel affect a review so much; Valentino Donna Born in Roma Intense, Aquatic Vanilla Dossier, Floral Marshmallow Dossier, CH Good Girl Blush, Fame Women Paco Rabanne, Burberry Her Intense, Alien Goddess Mugler, Soleil Blanc TF, Lost Cherry TF, Mod Vanilla Ariana Grande, CK One/Be)<br />
<br />
This is a FANTASTIC scent. I love violet so much, especially when it is so well done such as in this fragrance. It's powdery, however not overly so, and has a sweet facet due to the tuberose I can't get enough of.<br />
<br />
If I had to choose, the opening is my least favorite because of the lime, but the drydown is just so so lovely! To me this also smells sorta nutty, like a walnut. The sandalwood is to me what makes this scent so much more sophisticated than say Paco Rabanne's Fame (women's). The mango is 100% there in the beginning, however it takes a back seat the more this perfume dries down. The coconut is also there, and it's the kind I love which is more nutty as opposed to green. <br />
<br />
I have a sample of the Forte version, however got this as a gift and I have to admit I think I like this one a bit more. The forte version is slightly more mango forward, and definitely less nutty, but it is also creamier.  <br />
<br />
A love at first sniff, perfect for summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2125642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2125642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2096517" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vanillabeanshampoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025048"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2025048.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vanillabeanshampoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-des-Ors/Blue-Madeleine-92071.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92071.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blue Madeleine"title="Blue Madeleine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2096517ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2096517" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025048">vanillabeanshampoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 14:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a gorgeous coconut and flower blend. I get mainly coconut from this, with a powdery iris and flowers somewhere in the background. I don’t get any tuberose AT ALL. It melts into a soft musk and stays close to the skin after a few hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2096517"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2096517#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2047439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1613700">Smeraldina77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-21">05/21/24 08:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is quite nice. To me, it is similar to Coconut Fizz (which I have). It is basically a bit more floral (tuberose) version of Coconut Fizz. I do not smell the mango, which is a pity since I was hoping for it. If you have Coconut Fizz, I think you don't need this, and if you are amongst those who mourn the discontinued Coconut Fizz, you can definitely find a nice replacement in Florabloom.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; They are such nice, feminine scents. I tried the forte one first and I loved it, but then I got a sample of this one and I might love this even more. This is maybe a bit fresher, cleaner, less artificial. Longevity is also pretty good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2201915"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2201915#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="89854" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2223477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223477" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AleMHS"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1184210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AleMHS" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Nectarine-Blossom-Honey-3782.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3782.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nectarine Blossom & Honey"title="Nectarine Blossom & Honey"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223477ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223477" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184210">AleMHS</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 11:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested this today. My SA was so excited to show me this and I am so… Underwhelmed. This was an extremely bland milage of flowers that just didn’t smell good to me. Very much a toilet freshener in a slightly upscale public bathroom. It was an immediate no to such an extent that I didn’t even spend time with it to pick apart the notes like I do with some of the things I’m on the fence with.<br />
<br />
I don’t know what else to say, I’m rather disappointed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2223477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2223477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233201" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233201" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PerfumedParrot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/90056"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.90056.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PerfumedParrot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Cuir-Beluga-1019.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1019.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cuir Béluga"title="Cuir Béluga"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233201ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233201" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/90056">PerfumedParrot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 19:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like I’ve got melted raspberry ripple ice cream on my skin that’s getting warm and sweetly-sticky as it dries, then someone’s sprayed a pink air freshener and it’s all too synthetic and cloying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="89854"comment_id="2233201"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html?ccid=2233201#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="89854" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.13888.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>

            <span class="brand">Parfum d'Empire</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Azemour Les Orangers</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="As others have mentioned, this smells exactly like peeling a fresh orange. Longevity is weak at about 2-3 hours, so will require some reapplication. I find that longevity is much better under clothes than on exposed skin, and also leads to better retention of a citrusy/orange composition vs. the...">by
            <em>Snozzberry</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1662777.jpg"

                <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x600" id="fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1" v-pre>
</div>
            </div>
                <div style="clear:both; height: 1rem;"></div>
    
</div>
    </div>
</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html" class="en2inter">Khamrah Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html" class="en2inter">Le Male Elixir Jean Paul Gaultier</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">3.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        now_i_wear: "Currently I am wearing",
        confirm_delete: "Do you really want to delete your comment?",

    };

    
    

    let PerfumeSearchLangVar = {
        lang: "EN",

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');

</script>
